Actions.Name: Get message
Actions.Description: This operation is used to fetch the details of a message, given the message ID.

Actions.Name: List all messages
Actions.Description: This operation returns a list of all messages associated with your Plivo account.

Actions.Name: Make a call
Actions.Description: This operation is used to make a call.

Actions.Name: Send SMS
Actions.Description: This operation is used to send a text message.
